thread.title: Angry protest shuts down Puntarenas-Paquera ferry
thread.title_full: Angry protest shuts down Puntarenas-Paquera ferry -The Tico Times

author: MICHAEL KRUMHOLTZ AND KARL KAHLER
title: Angry protest shuts down Puntarenas-Paquera ferry
text:
The popular Gulf of Nicoya car ferry connecting Puntarenas and Paquera — a major gateway for both tourists and locals between the mainland and Nicoya Peninsula — was shut down Wednesday because of strikes and protests by people in Paquera demanding better roads.
Read the full story in Travel .
